verse.name: v1
verse.lines: We stand and lift up our hands; newline For the joy of the Lord is our strength. newline We bow down and worship Him now, newline how great, how awesome is He. newline And together we sing,

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Holy Is The Lord God Almighty, newline The Earth is filled with His glory. newline Holy Is The Lord God Almighty, newline The Earth is filled with His glory, newline The Earth is filled with His glory.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: It's rising up all around, newline It's the anthem of the Lord's renown. newline It's rising up all around, newline It's the anthem of the Lord's renown. newline And together we sing, everyone sing
